md

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • md.Box

  • public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
    (Package private) Stores the data of periodic boundary box for MD.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi
